name: Last Continue: Customization prototype
description:
After stealing a ship and escaping a hostile alien world, you are finally able to get some rest. Still, danger isn't far behind. With the help of your AI partner, you must tune your ship for battle.

Enhance and design your own weapons, and test them test them out within intense simulations. The enemy is hot on your tail, and when the going gets hot, the only way out is through.
